page.title: 17HOBBIES OF DARREN AND GEMMA
page.content: Darren's hobby is moto-cross.This is a very dangerous sport which takes a lot of courage because it means riding a motor bike over rough ground and jumping off vertical drops as high as a man.So far he has been lucky because he hasn't broken any bones,but his brother used to scramble and he broke his collar bone. Gemma's hobby is collecting old bottles from the past.So far she has collected quite a few.One of them is an old lemonade bottle,and another is a milk bottle dated 1948,the same year as her mother was born.She said that she used to use them when she was a little girl.Gemma attends Robinsons End Middle School,and most of the bottles she has collected have come from just over the road from the school.
